net.gravitydevelopment.anticheat.config.providers

Interface Levels

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLLevelsHolder, YamlLevelsHolder

    public interface Levels

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadLevelToUser(User user)
      Checks for a stored level for this user, and loads it to their object if found.
      void saveLevelFromUser(User user)
      Saves the user's level to storage.
      void saveLevelsFromUsers(java.util.List<User> users)
      Saves a list of user's levels to storage.
      void updateLevelToUser(User user)
      Check to see if the user's level has been manually changed since it was loaded, and update it if needed

    • Method Detail

      • loadLevelToUser

        void loadLevelToUser(User user)
        Checks for a stored level for this user, and loads it to their object if found.
        Parameters:
        user - User to load.

      • saveLevelFromUser

        void saveLevelFromUser(User user)
        Saves the user's level to storage.
        Parameters:
        user - User to save.

      • saveLevelsFromUsers

        void saveLevelsFromUsers(java.util.List<User> users)
        Saves a list of user's levels to storage. Used on server shutdown / reload.
        Parameters:
        users - List of users to save.

      • updateLevelToUser

        void updateLevelToUser(User user)
        Check to see if the user's level has been manually changed since it was loaded, and update it if needed
        Parameters:
        user - User to update.
